item.title: Contact
item.description: Let’s get in touch. --- Email me at brianchen.chen@mail.utoronto.ca --- Check out my projects on Github --- Connect with me on LinkedIn

item.title: chenbrian.ca
item.description: My hope is that this website can grow into a place to document my work for myself and make publicly available solutions that I come across. This website is built with Hugo and hosted on GitHub Pages. Nothing too fancy.

item.title: Hi, I'm Brian
item.description: And I’m a student, software developer, and pokemon go enthusiast Let’s put a face to the name I’m a student at the University of Toronto Engineering Science program passionate about identifying problems in the world around me and creating solutions for them. When I’m not cramming for school, I enjoy cooking and playing badminton. If you’re looking for people to hit with, I’m always down. Q: How can you tell if someone uses Linux?

item.title: First post
item.description: You made it! The first post on my blog. Sorry to get your hopes up, but there’s not much to see here. Maybe get to know me? Have a Pikachu?
